scripts.install: npm install --save-dev concurrently && npm run install-libs && npm run install-frontend && npm run install-backend
scripts.install-backend: cd backend && npm install && npm install express && npm install nodemailer && npm install dotenv && npm install cors && npm install validator
scripts.install-frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm install react-icons --save
scripts.install-libs: npm install --save-dev @babel/plugin-proposal-private-property-in-object && npm install cors && npm install query-string && npm install axios && npm install moment-timezone
